sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使困惑，迷惑，糊涂，伤脑筋"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: puzzle, bewilder, confuse, embarrass, perplex, baffle, confound, distract
means: puzzle ： 侧重使人难于理解、困惑、伤脑筋。
bewilder ： 语气强烈，指因迷不解或惊愕而慌乱，不知所措，无法清醒地思考。
confuse ： 语气较弱，指由于混淆、混乱而糊涂。
embarrass ： 常指因处境或困难问题而感到窘迫、局促不安或焦急而不知所措。
perplex ： 除困惑外，还含焦虑或缺乏把握之意，因而难于作出决定，无从下手处理。
baffle ： 语气最强，多指遇见奇怪情景或复杂困难情况时所产生的惶恐困惑心理。
confound ： 常指人惊慌失措和狼狈不堪。
distract ： 主要用于注意力分散、思想矛盾或过分激动时产生的昏乱。

sentence.Network_en: We're dismal enough without conjuring up ghosts and visions to perplex us.
sentence.Network_cn: 用不着招神现鬼来缠我们,我们已够惨的啦.

sentence.Network_en: This problem is hard enough to perplex even the teacher.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个问题确实很难,以至于老师都迷惑不解.

sentence.Network_en: I have no wish to perplex the issue.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... complexion n 面色，表情 perplex v 使复杂，迷惑 perplexed a 迷惑的.
博士入学考试词汇 - 博士 ... perpetual 永久,终身的 perplex 使困惑,使迷惑 persecute 迫害,烦扰.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... per- == 加强意义 perplex 困惑 permute 改变顺序.
[推荐]外贸常用英语[旺旺英语论坛] ... perpetual 永久的，永恒的 perplex 迷惑，难住 persecute 迫害.

list.abs: a wide view his piece , we can see its artistic thought to turn into from " perplexed generation " to the " dauntless person son " spirit .纵观他的佳作，我们可以看到其创作思想是从“迷惘的一代”到“硬汉子”精神的演变。

by giving your conscious attention and devotion to the solution of a perplexing problem , your subconscious mind gathers all the necessary information and presents it full-blown to the conscious mind .通过将你的表意识的注意力全心投入于一个复杂问题的解决方案中，你的潜意识收集了所有的必要信息，并且全面将之呈送
for people interested in cetacean evolution the most perplexing problem always been : why are there so many species of [ beaked whale ] ?对于那些对鲸豚类进化感兴趣的人来说，最困扰的问题总是：为什么突吻鲸会有那么多的种类？
to make or become complex or perplexing ., 使复杂或令人困惑.

mental problem refers to the abnormal mental behavior . according to the severity , mental problem is divided into psychological perplexity , psychological obstacle and psychosis .心理问题是指各种心理及行为异常情形，通常把心理问题根据其严重程度，分为心理困扰、心理障碍和精神病。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (as the adjective perplexed): from the obsolete adjective perplex 'bewildered', from Latin perplexus 'entangled', based on plexus 'interwoven', from the verb plectere

entry.def: If something perplexes you, it confuses and worries you because you do not understand it or because it causes you difficulty.

example.ex: It perplexed him because he was tackling it the wrong way.
example.tran: 由于处理不当，这个问题令他大伤脑筋。

means.word_mean: 1. be a mystery or bewildering to;

sentences.sentence: "There was a new development that complicated the matter"

auth_sentence.content: An obscure...dialect just about to perplex three generations of philologists.
auth_sentence.res_content: An obscure...dialect just about to perplex three generations of philologists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An obscure...dialect just about to perplex three generations of philologists.

auth_sentence.content: But fitting the tracksuit seemed to perplex Dolce.
auth_sentence.res_content: But fitting the tracksuit seemed to perplex Dolce.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But fitting the tracksuit seemed to perplex Dolce.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+plex重叠→全部重叠→复杂的
du二+plex重叠→二次重叠→双重的
per全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
com全部+plex重叠→全部重叠→复杂的
com全部+plex重叠+ion表名词→全部表情重叠于面部→面色

stems_affixes.value_cn: [医][血管、淋巴管、神经等]的丛,网
stems_affixes.word_buile: plex重叠+us→n.[医][血管、淋巴管、神经等]的丛,网

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使困惑,使费解,使复杂化
stems_affixes.word_buile: per全部+plex重叠→从头到尾全部重叠→迷惑

sentences.cn: 这个问题使我迷惑不解。

sentences.en: He perplexed me with this problem.
sentences.cn: 他用这个问题难住了我。

jushi.english: I am perplexed to know what to do.
This problem is hard enough to perplex the teacher.
jushi.chinese: 这个问题够难的,连老师也答不出来。
